Module Basics
Package basics.util

Class ColorUtil

java.lang.Object
basics.util.ColorUtil
public class ColorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
Utility functions for colors, without any reference to java.awt.Color.
Author:
Jörg Roth (Joerg.Roth@Wireless-earth.org)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String col2hex​(int[] col)
    Convert three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha) to 6-digit hex string.
    static int col2rgb​(int[] col)
    Convert color with three ints of 0...255 (i.e. no alpha) to single rgb integer value.
    static int[] heatColor​(float heat)
    Computes a 'heat color' (i.e. dark grey for 'cold' and dens red for 'hot'.
    static int[] hex2col​(java.lang.String hexString)
    Convert a 6-digit hex string to three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha).
    static int[] HSBtoRGB​(float hue, float saturation, float brightness)
    Converts from the HSB (hue, saturation, brightness) color model to the RGB (red, green, blue) color model.
    static int[] rgb2col​(int rgb)
    Convert single rgb integer value to color with three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha).

    • col2rgb

      public static int col2rgb​(int[] col)
      Convert color with three ints of 0...255 (i.e. no alpha) to single rgb integer value.
      Parameters:
      col - array of three with red, green blue
      Returns:
      rgb integer value

    • rgb2col

      public static int[] rgb2col​(int rgb)
      Convert single rgb integer value to color with three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha).
      Parameters:
      rgb - rgb integer value
      Returns:
      array of three with red, green blue

    • hex2col

      public static int[] hex2col​(java.lang.String hexString)
      Convert a 6-digit hex string to three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha).
      Parameters:
      hexString - hex string
      Returns:
      array of three with red, green blue

    • col2hex

      public static java.lang.String col2hex​(int[] col)
      Convert three ints of 0...255 (ignorien alpha) to 6-digit hex string.
      Parameters:
      col - array of three with red, green blue
      Returns:
      hex string

    • heatColor

      public static int[] heatColor​(float heat)
      Computes a 'heat color' (i.e. dark grey for 'cold' and dens red for 'hot'. The given heat is a value 0.0 (cold)...1.0 (hot). It is mapped to 0.0 or 1.0 for smaller or greater values.
      Parameters:
      heat - a heat value
      Returns:
      array of three with red, green blue

    • HSBtoRGB

      public static int[] HSBtoRGB​(float hue, float saturation, float brightness)
      Converts from the HSB (hue, saturation, brightness) color model to the RGB (red, green, blue) color model. The hue may be any floating point; it's fractional portion is used to select the angle in the HSB model. The saturation and brightness must be between 0 and 1. The result is suitable for creating an RGB color with the one-argument constructor.
      Parameters:
      hue - the hue of the HSB value
      saturation - the saturation of the HSB value
      brightness - the brightness of the HSB value
      Returns:
      array of three with red, green blue
